name: Space Time! (Trivex)
description:
Theme is "Less is more":

It is a simple top down space shooter where you get more points for the enemy if it is killed when the wave timer is closer to 0! Time it correctly however, because if you don't manage to kill the wave before the timer runs out, it is game over!

Controls:

W/S - thrust forward / backward

A/D - turn left / right

Mouse L-click / Space - Fire

Hints:

Too score high one way to do it is:

1) Beginning of wave, damage all enemies so that they have 1 hp left.

2) Dodge bullets

3) When you think that you have just enough time to kill them all before the timer runs out - do it! But don't let that timer run out :) 

Submission for BTP Game Jam # 3 - My first ever game jam!

I hope you enjoy my small creation
